operations.body: ESP32 baseline completed successfully. Generated artifacts under tmp/acceptance/v0.1.0/2026-02-08/artifacts/esp32.
STM32 baseline completed successfully. Generated artifacts under tmp/acceptance/v0.1.0/2026-02-08/artifacts/stm32.
RP2040 baseline completed successfully. Generated artifacts under tmp/acceptance/v0.1.0/2026-02-08/artifacts/rp2040.
AVR baseline completed successfully. Generated artifacts under tmp/acceptance/v0.1.0/2026-02-08/artifacts/avr.

Failure summary started. Found defect: invalid board input returns success and still generates config files. Bug filed as SCRUM-52. Evidence: tmp/acceptance/v0.1.0/2026-02-08/artifacts/invalid_board.txt and notes.md.
Reference board baseline runs completed for ESP32/STM32/RP2040/AVR. One defect discovered in invalid-board failure path (SCRUM-52).
